Function to return the textual model for lavaan fit, depending on which simulation scenario we are investigating.

Source: R/01-utilities.R
txt_mod.Rd

Function to return the textual model for lavaan fit, depending on which simulation scenario we are investigating.

Usage

txt_mod(model.no = 1L)

Arguments

model.no

(integer) Choose from 1--5. See details.

Value

Character vector of factor model to input to lavaan::lavaan().

Examples

txt_mod(1)
#> [1] "eta1 =~ NA*y1 + y2 + y3 + y4 + y5"
